name: nonconcern
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] a lack of concern: They're the victims of many years of nonconcern for human life. I wish I shared your nonconcern about this.
[ C ] something that is not of interest or concern to someone: His state of alarm seemed such a non-concern to the interpreter.
More examplesFewer examplesThey drew attention to the government's non-concern about the level of inflation.
